trans-unit.source: Display maps with 2D, 3D, and Streetside views
trans-unit.target: Display maps with 2D, 3D, and Streetside views

trans-unit.source: Display customizable maps in your app by using the MapControl class.
trans-unit.target: Display customizable maps in your app by using the MapControl class.

trans-unit.source: This topic also introduces aerial 3D and Streetside views.
trans-unit.target: This topic also introduces aerial 3D and Streetside views.

trans-unit.source: Display maps with 2D, 3D, and Streetside views
trans-unit.target: Display maps with 2D, 3D, and Streetside views

trans-unit.source: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132)
trans-unit.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132)

trans-unit.source: Display customizable maps in your app by using the [**MapControl**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637004) class.
trans-unit.target: Display customizable maps in your app by using the [**MapControl**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637004) class.

trans-unit.source: This topic also introduces aerial 3D and Streetside views.
trans-unit.target: This topic also introduces aerial 3D and Streetside views.

trans-unit.source: **Tip** To learn more about using maps in your app, download the following sample from the [Windows-universal-samples repo](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=619979) on GitHub.
trans-unit.target: **Tip** To learn more about using maps in your app, download the following sample from the [Windows-universal-samples repo](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=619979) on GitHub.

trans-unit.source: Universal Windows Platform (UWP) map sample
trans-unit.target: Universal Windows Platform (UWP) map sample

trans-unit.source: Add the map control to your app
trans-unit.target: Add the map control to your app

trans-unit.source: Display a map on a XAML page by adding a [**MapControl**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637004).
trans-unit.target: Display a map on a XAML page by adding a [**MapControl**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637004).

trans-unit.source: To use the **MapControl**, you must declare the [**Windows.UI.Xaml.Controls.Maps**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn610751) namespace in the XAML page or in your code.
trans-unit.target: To use the **MapControl**, you must declare the [**Windows.UI.Xaml.Controls.Maps**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn610751) namespace in the XAML page or in your code.

trans-unit.source: If you drag the control from the Toolbox, this namespace declaration is added automatically.
trans-unit.target: If you drag the control from the Toolbox, this namespace declaration is added automatically.

trans-unit.source: If you add the **MapControl** to the XAML page manually, you must add the namespace declaration manually at the top of the page.
trans-unit.target: If you add the **MapControl** to the XAML page manually, you must add the namespace declaration manually at the top of the page.

trans-unit.source: The following example displays a basic map control and configures the map to display the zoom and tilt controls in addition to accepting touch inputs.
trans-unit.target: The following example displays a basic map control and configures the map to display the zoom and tilt controls in addition to accepting touch inputs.

trans-unit.source: For more info about customizing the appearance of the map, see [Configure the map](#mapconfig).
trans-unit.target: For more info about customizing the appearance of the map, see [Configure the map](#mapconfig).

trans-unit.source: If you add the map control in your code, you must declare the namespace manually at the top of the code file.
trans-unit.target: If you add the map control in your code, you must declare the namespace manually at the top of the code file.

trans-unit.source: Get and set a maps authentication key
trans-unit.target: Get and set a maps authentication key

trans-unit.source: Before you can use [**MapControl**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637004) and map services, you must specify the maps authentication key as the value of the [**MapServiceToken**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637036) property.
trans-unit.target: Before you can use [**MapControl**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637004) and map services, you must specify the maps authentication key as the value of the [**MapServiceToken**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637036) property.

trans-unit.source: In the previous examples, replace `EnterYourAuthenticationKeyHere` with the key you get from the [Bing Maps Developer Center](https://www.bingmapsportal.com/).
trans-unit.target: In the previous examples, replace `EnterYourAuthenticationKeyHere` with the key you get from the [Bing Maps Developer Center](https://www.bingmapsportal.com/).

trans-unit.source: The text **Warning: MapServiceToken not specified** continues to appear below the control until you specify the maps authentication key.
trans-unit.target: The text **Warning: MapServiceToken not specified** continues to appear below the control until you specify the maps authentication key.

trans-unit.source: For more info about getting and setting a maps authentication key, see [Request a maps authentication key](authentication-key.md).
trans-unit.target: For more info about getting and setting a maps authentication key, see [Request a maps authentication key](authentication-key.md).

trans-unit.source: Set a starting location for the map
trans-unit.target: Set a starting location for the map

trans-unit.source: Set the location to display on the map by specifying the [**Center**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637005) property of the [**MapControl**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637004) in your code or by binding the property in your XAML markup.
trans-unit.target: Set the location to display on the map by specifying the [**Center**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637005) property of the [**MapControl**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637004) in your code or by binding the property in your XAML markup.

trans-unit.source: The following example displays a map with the city of Seattle as its center.
trans-unit.target: The following example displays a map with the city of Seattle as its center.

trans-unit.source: **Tip** Since a string can't be converted to a [**Geopoint**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn263675), you can't specify a value for the [**Center**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637005) property in XAML markup unless you use data binding.
trans-unit.target: **Tip** Since a string can't be converted to a [**Geopoint**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn263675), you can't specify a value for the [**Center**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637005) property in XAML markup unless you use data binding.

trans-unit.source: (This limitation also applies to the [**MapControl.Location**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn653264) attached property.)
trans-unit.target: (This limitation also applies to the [**MapControl.Location**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn653264) attached property.)

trans-unit.source: an example of the map control.
trans-unit.target: an example of the map control.

trans-unit.source: Set the current location of the map
trans-unit.target: Set the current location of the map

trans-unit.source: Before your app can access the user’s location, your app must call the [**RequestAccessAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn859152) method.
trans-unit.target: Before your app can access the user’s location, your app must call the [**RequestAccessAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn859152) method.

trans-unit.source: At that time, your app must be in the foreground and **RequestAccessAsync** must be called from the UI thread.
trans-unit.target: At that time, your app must be in the foreground and **RequestAccessAsync** must be called from the UI thread.

trans-unit.source: Until the user grants your app permission to their location, your app can't access location data.
trans-unit.target: Until the user grants your app permission to their location, your app can't access location data.

trans-unit.source: Get the current location of the device (if location is available) by using the [**GetGeopositionAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh973536) method of the [**Geolocator**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br225534) class.
trans-unit.target: Get the current location of the device (if location is available) by using the [**GetGeopositionAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh973536) method of the [**Geolocator**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br225534) class.

trans-unit.source: To obtain the corresponding [**Geopoint**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn263675), use the [**Point**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn263665) property of the geoposition's geocoordinate.
trans-unit.target: To obtain the corresponding [**Geopoint**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn263675), use the [**Point**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn263665) property of the geoposition's geocoordinate.

trans-unit.source: For more info, see [Get current location](get-location.md).
trans-unit.target: For more info, see [Get current location](get-location.md).

trans-unit.source: When you display your device's location on a map, consider displaying graphics and setting the zoom level based on the accuracy of the location data.
trans-unit.target: When you display your device's location on a map, consider displaying graphics and setting the zoom level based on the accuracy of the location data.

trans-unit.source: For more info, see [Guidelines for location-aware apps](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh465148).
trans-unit.target: For more info, see [Guidelines for location-aware apps](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh465148).

trans-unit.source: Change the location of the map
trans-unit.target: Change the location of the map

trans-unit.source: To change the location that appears in a 2D map, call one of the overloads of the [**TrySetViewAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637060) method.
trans-unit.target: To change the location that appears in a 2D map, call one of the overloads of the [**TrySetViewAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637060) method.

trans-unit.source: Use that method to specify new values for [**Center**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637005), [**ZoomLevel**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637068), [**Heading**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637019), and [**Pitch**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637044).
trans-unit.target: Use that method to specify new values for [**Center**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637005), [**ZoomLevel**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637068), [**Heading**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637019), and [**Pitch**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637044).

trans-unit.source: You can also specify an optional animation to use when the view changes by providing a constant from the [**MapAnimationKind**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637002) enumeration.
trans-unit.target: You can also specify an optional animation to use when the view changes by providing a constant from the [**MapAnimationKind**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637002) enumeration.

trans-unit.source: To change the location of a 3D map, use the [**TrySetSceneAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn974296) method instead.
trans-unit.target: To change the location of a 3D map, use the [**TrySetSceneAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn974296) method instead.

trans-unit.source: For more info, see [Display 3D views](#display3d).
trans-unit.target: For more info, see [Display 3D views](#display3d).

trans-unit.source: Call the [**TrySetViewBoundsAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637065) method to display the contents of a [**GeoboundingBox**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn607949) on the map.
trans-unit.target: Call the [**TrySetViewBoundsAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637065) method to display the contents of a [**GeoboundingBox**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn607949) on the map.

trans-unit.source: Use this method, for example, to display a route or a portion of a route on the map.
trans-unit.target: Use this method, for example, to display a route or a portion of a route on the map.

trans-unit.source: For more info, see [Display routes and directions on a map](routes-and-directions.md).
trans-unit.target: For more info, see [Display routes and directions on a map](routes-and-directions.md).

trans-unit.source: Configure the map
trans-unit.target: Configure the map

trans-unit.source: Configure the map and its appearance by setting the values of the following properties of the [**MapControl**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637004).
trans-unit.target: Configure the map and its appearance by setting the values of the following properties of the [**MapControl**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637004).

trans-unit.source: Map settings
trans-unit.target: Map settings

trans-unit.source: Set the **center** of the map to a geographic point by setting the [**Center**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637005) property.
trans-unit.target: Set the **center** of the map to a geographic point by setting the [**Center**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637005) property.

trans-unit.source: Set the **zoom level** of the map by setting the [**ZoomLevel**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637068) property to a value between 1 and 20.
trans-unit.target: Set the **zoom level** of the map by setting the [**ZoomLevel**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637068) property to a value between 1 and 20.

trans-unit.source: Set the **rotation** of the map by setting the [**Heading**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637019) property, where 0 or 360 degrees = North, 90 = East, 180 = South, and 270 = West.
trans-unit.target: Set the **rotation** of the map by setting the [**Heading**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637019) property, where 0 or 360 degrees = North, 90 = East, 180 = South, and 270 = West.

trans-unit.source: Set the **tilt** of the map by setting the [**DesiredPitch**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637012) property to a value between 0 and 65 degrees.
trans-unit.target: Set the **tilt** of the map by setting the [**DesiredPitch**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637012) property to a value between 0 and 65 degrees.

trans-unit.source: Map appearance
trans-unit.target: Map appearance

trans-unit.source: Specify the **type** of map - for example, a road map or an aerial map - by setting the [**Style**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637051) property with one of the [**MapStyle**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637127) constants.
trans-unit.target: Specify the **type** of map - for example, a road map or an aerial map - by setting the [**Style**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637051) property with one of the [**MapStyle**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637127) constants.

trans-unit.source: Set the **color scheme** of the map to light or dark by setting the [**ColorScheme**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637010) property with one of the [**MapColorScheme**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637003) constants.
trans-unit.target: Set the **color scheme** of the map to light or dark by setting the [**ColorScheme**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637010) property with one of the [**MapColorScheme**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637003) constants.

trans-unit.source: Show information on the map by setting the values of the following properties of the [**MapControl**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637004).
trans-unit.target: Show information on the map by setting the values of the following properties of the [**MapControl**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637004).

trans-unit.source: Display **buildings and landmarks** on the map by enabling or disabling the [**LandmarksVisible**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637023) property.
trans-unit.target: Display **buildings and landmarks** on the map by enabling or disabling the [**LandmarksVisible**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637023) property.

trans-unit.source: Display **pedestrian features** such as public stairs on the map by enabling or disabling the [**PedestrianFeaturesVisible**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637042) property.
trans-unit.target: Display **pedestrian features** such as public stairs on the map by enabling or disabling the [**PedestrianFeaturesVisible**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637042) property.

trans-unit.source: Display **traffic** on the map by enabling or disabling the [**TrafficFlowVisible**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637055) property.
trans-unit.target: Display **traffic** on the map by enabling or disabling the [**TrafficFlowVisible**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637055) property.

trans-unit.source: Specify whether the **watermark** is displayed on the map by setting the [**WatermarkMode**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637066) property to one of the [**MapWatermarkMode**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn610749) constants.
trans-unit.target: Specify whether the **watermark** is displayed on the map by setting the [**WatermarkMode**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637066) property to one of the [**MapWatermarkMode**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn610749) constants.

trans-unit.source: Display a **driving or walking route** on the map by adding a [**MapRouteView**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637122) to the [**Routes**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637047) collection of the Map control.
trans-unit.target: Display a **driving or walking route** on the map by adding a [**MapRouteView**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637122) to the [**Routes**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637047) collection of the Map control.

trans-unit.source: For more info and an example, see [Display routes and directions on a map](routes-and-directions.md).
trans-unit.target: For more info and an example, see [Display routes and directions on a map](routes-and-directions.md).

trans-unit.source: For info about how to display pushpins, shapes, and XAML controls in the [**MapControl**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637004), see [Display points of interest (POI) on a map](display-poi.md).
trans-unit.target: For info about how to display pushpins, shapes, and XAML controls in the [**MapControl**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637004), see [Display points of interest (POI) on a map](display-poi.md).

trans-unit.source: Display Streetside views
trans-unit.target: Display Streetside views

trans-unit.source: A Streetside view is a street-level perspective of a location that appears on top of the map control.
trans-unit.target: A Streetside view is a street-level perspective of a location that appears on top of the map control.

trans-unit.source: an example of a streetside view of the map control.
trans-unit.target: an example of a streetside view of the map control.

trans-unit.source: Consider the experience "inside" the Streetside view separate from the map originally displayed in the map control.
trans-unit.target: Consider the experience "inside" the Streetside view separate from the map originally displayed in the map control.

trans-unit.source: For example, changing the location in the Streetside view does not change the location or appearance of the map "under" the Streetside view.
trans-unit.target: For example, changing the location in the Streetside view does not change the location or appearance of the map "under" the Streetside view.

trans-unit.source: After you close the Streetside view (by clicking the **X** in the upper right corner of the control), the original map remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: After you close the Streetside view (by clicking the **X** in the upper right corner of the control), the original map remains unchanged.

trans-unit.source: To display a Streetside view
trans-unit.target: To display a Streetside view

trans-unit.source: Determine if Streetside views are supported on the device by checking [**IsStreetsideSupported**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn974271).
trans-unit.target: Determine if Streetside views are supported on the device by checking [**IsStreetsideSupported**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn974271).

trans-unit.source: If Streetside view is supported, create a [**StreetsidePanorama**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn974360) near the specified location by calling [**FindNearbyAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn974361).
trans-unit.target: If Streetside view is supported, create a [**StreetsidePanorama**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn974360) near the specified location by calling [**FindNearbyAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn974361).

trans-unit.source: Determine if a nearby panorama was found by checking if the [**StreetsidePanorama**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn974360) is not null
trans-unit.target: Determine if a nearby panorama was found by checking if the [**StreetsidePanorama**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn974360) is not null

trans-unit.source: If a nearby panorama was found, create a [**StreetsideExperience**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn974356) for the map control's [**CustomExperience**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn974263) property.
trans-unit.target: If a nearby panorama was found, create a [**StreetsideExperience**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn974356) for the map control's [**CustomExperience**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn974263) property.

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to display a Streetside view similar to the previous image.
trans-unit.target: This example shows how to display a Streetside view similar to the previous image.

trans-unit.source: **Note** The overview map will not appear if the map control is sized too small.
trans-unit.target: **Note** The overview map will not appear if the map control is sized too small.

trans-unit.source: Display aerial 3D views
trans-unit.target: Display aerial 3D views

trans-unit.source: Specify a 3D perspective of the map by using the [**MapScene**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn974329) class.
trans-unit.target: Specify a 3D perspective of the map by using the [**MapScene**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn974329) class.

trans-unit.source: The map scene represents the 3D view that appears in the map.
trans-unit.target: The map scene represents the 3D view that appears in the map.

trans-unit.source: The [**MapCamera**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn974244) class represents the position of the camera that would display such a view.
trans-unit.target: The [**MapCamera**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn974244) class represents the position of the camera that would display such a view.

trans-unit.source: To make buildings and other features on the map surface appear in 3D, set the map control's [**Style**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637051) property to [**MapStyle.Aerial3DWithRoads**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637127).
trans-unit.target: To make buildings and other features on the map surface appear in 3D, set the map control's [**Style**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637051) property to [**MapStyle.Aerial3DWithRoads**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637127).

trans-unit.source: This is an example of a 3D view with the **Aerial3DWithRoads** style.
trans-unit.target: This is an example of a 3D view with the **Aerial3DWithRoads** style.

trans-unit.source: an example of a 3d map view.
trans-unit.target: an example of a 3d map view.

trans-unit.source: To display a 3D view
trans-unit.target: To display a 3D view

trans-unit.source: Determine if 3D views are supported on the device by checking [**Is3DSupported**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn974265).
trans-unit.target: Determine if 3D views are supported on the device by checking [**Is3DSupported**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn974265).

trans-unit.source: If 3D views is supported, set the map control's [**Style**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637051) property to [**MapStyle.Aerial3DWithRoads**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637127).
trans-unit.target: If 3D views is supported, set the map control's [**Style**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637051) property to [**MapStyle.Aerial3DWithRoads**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637127).

trans-unit.source: Create a [**MapScene**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn974329) object using one of the many **CreateFrom** methods, such as [**CreateFromLocationAndRadius**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn974336) and [**CreateFromCamera**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn974334).
trans-unit.target: Create a [**MapScene**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn974329) object using one of the many **CreateFrom** methods, such as [**CreateFromLocationAndRadius**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn974336) and [**CreateFromCamera**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn974334).

trans-unit.source: Call [**TrySetSceneAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn974296) to display the 3D view.
trans-unit.target: Call [**TrySetSceneAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn974296) to display the 3D view.

trans-unit.source: You can also specify an optional animation to use when the view changes by providing a constant from the [**MapAnimationKind**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637002) enumeration.
trans-unit.target: You can also specify an optional animation to use when the view changes by providing a constant from the [**MapAnimationKind**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637002) enumeration.

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to display a 3D view.
trans-unit.target: This example shows how to display a 3D view.

trans-unit.source: Get info about locations and elements
trans-unit.target: Get info about locations and elements

trans-unit.source: Get info about locations on the map by calling the following methods of the [**MapControl**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637004).
trans-unit.target: Get info about locations on the map by calling the following methods of the [**MapControl**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637004).

trans-unit.source: [**GetLocationFromOffset**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637016) method - Get the geographic location that corresponds to the specified point in the viewport of the Map control.
trans-unit.target: [**GetLocationFromOffset**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637016) method - Get the geographic location that corresponds to the specified point in the viewport of the Map control.

trans-unit.source: [**GetOffsetFromLocation**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637018) method - Get the point in the viewport of the Map control that corresponds to the specified geographic location.
trans-unit.target: [**GetOffsetFromLocation**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637018) method - Get the point in the viewport of the Map control that corresponds to the specified geographic location.

trans-unit.source: [**IsLocationInView**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637022) method - Determine whether the specified geographic location is currently visible in the viewport of the Map control.
trans-unit.target: [**IsLocationInView**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637022) method - Determine whether the specified geographic location is currently visible in the viewport of the Map control.

trans-unit.source: [**FindMapElementsAtOffset**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637014) method - Get the elements on the map located at the specified point in the viewport of the Map control.
trans-unit.target: [**FindMapElementsAtOffset**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637014) method - Get the elements on the map located at the specified point in the viewport of the Map control.

trans-unit.source: Handle user interaction and changes
trans-unit.target: Handle user interaction and changes

trans-unit.source: Handle user input gestures on the map by handling the following events of the [**MapControl**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637004).
trans-unit.target: Handle user input gestures on the map by handling the following events of the [**MapControl**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637004).

trans-unit.source: Get info about the geographic location on the map and the physical position in the viewport where the gesture occurred by checking the values of the [**Location**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637091) and [**Position**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637093) properties of the [**MapInputEventArgs**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637090).
trans-unit.target: Get info about the geographic location on the map and the physical position in the viewport where the gesture occurred by checking the values of the [**Location**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637091) and [**Position**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637093) properties of the [**MapInputEventArgs**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637090).
